dict.acceptation: 带来，引来；促使，引起；提供；导致；

sent.orig: I can bring joy to others or I can also bring hatred and sorrows.
sent.trans: 我能够带给别人快乐，也能够带给仇恨或悲伤。

sent.orig: A unilateral withdrawal would not bring formal peace, but it could at least bring calm.
sent.trans: 单边撤离计划虽然不能带来真正的和平，但至少能带来平静。

sent.orig: Any of you niggaz from New York that wanna bring it bring it.
sent.trans: 你们这些NewYork来的黑鬼想捣乱。

sent.orig: Part-time job can bring many positives to teenager's life. Although, it can also bring some negatives.
sent.trans: 兼职工作可以给许多青少年的生活带来积极的影响，尽管它也能带来一些负面。

sent.orig: Wearing green underwear is supposed to bring money, and white underwear may bring good health.
sent.trans: 据信穿绿色内衣会带来财运，而穿白色内衣也许能带来健康。
